# utils.adjust_range { #pyLHD.utils.adjust_range }

`utils.adjust_range(arr, min, max, digits=None)`

Adjust the range of a design to [min,max]

## Parameters

| Name     | Type          | Description                                     | Default    |
|----------|---------------|-------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `arr`    | numpy.ndarray | A design matrix                                 | _required_ |
| `min`    | float         | desired lower bound of design                   | _required_ |
| `max`    | float         | desired upper bound of design                   | _required_ |
| `digits` | int           | number of digits to which the design is rounded | `None`     |

## Returns

| Type          | Description                     |
|---------------|---------------------------------|
| npt.ArrayLike | Design with new range [min,max] |

## Examples



```{python}
import pyLHD
random_lhd = pyLHD.random_lhd(n_rows=5,n_columns=3)
```
```{python}
pyLHD.adjust_range(random_lhd,-1, 1)
```
```{python}
pyLHD.adjust_range(random_lhd, 5, 12, digits = 3)
```
